text: The San Marino Stadium (formerly Stadio Olimpico di Serravalle) is a football stadium in Serravalle, San Marino and is the home stadium of the San Marino national football team. It has a capacity of 6,664. The stadium was opened in 1969. == Other websites == * Category:1969 establishments in Europe Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Sport in San Marino
title: San Marino Stadium
